Bluffs Park Workout Station

(cid:190) Project Schedule: November 2020 – March 2021

Civic Center Way Improvements

(cid:190) Updates:

(cid:131) Work Hours: Monday through Friday 7:00AM to 4:00PM, Saturdays

7:00AM to 4:00PM

(cid:131) The contractor is currently working at the section between Vista
Pacifica and the condos on Civic Center Way. This phase of work will
require the temporary closure of Civic Center Way. Portions of the
curb and gutter have been placed and the contactor is working on the
proposed retaining wall. This portion of work is anticipated to be
completed in early February 2021.', metadata={'chunk_index': 4, 'source': 'data/civic/extracted_data/malibucity_agenda__01272021-1626.txt', 'start_index': 3551}), Document(page_content='(cid:190) Updates:

started and is anticipated to be completed by the Spring of 2022.

Clover Heights Storm Drain (FEMA Project)

(cid:190) Project Description: This project consists of design and construction of a
few storm drain on Clover Heights. The existing storm drain facility ends at
the intersection of Clover Heights and Harvester Road. During storms, this
intersection floods and causes debris to block the road. An extended storm
drain towards the end of Clover Heights will help eliminate this issue.

(cid:190) Estimated Schedule:

(cid:131) Complete Design: Spring 2022
(cid:131) Begin Construction: Summer 2022

Latigo Canyon Road Culvert Repairs (FEMA/CalOES Project)

(cid:190) Project Description: This project consists of repairing the existing storm
drain on Latigo Canyon Road located approximately 2,500 feet from PCH
that was damaged by the Woolsey Fire.

(cid:190) Estimated Schedule:

(cid:131) Complete Design: Winter 2021
(cid:131) Begin Construction: Spring 2022', metadata={'chunk_index': 10, 'source': 'data/civic/extracted_data/malibucity_agenda__01272021-1626.txt', 'start_index': 8856}), Document(page_content='Agenda Item # 4.A.










Capital Improvement Projects (Not Started)

Annual Street Maintenance

(cid:190) Project Description: This project provides for the reconstruction and

maintenance of City streets.

(cid:190) Estimated Schedule:

(cid:131) Complete Design: Spring 2021
(cid:131) Begin Construction: Summer 2021

Bluffs Park Shade Structure

(cid:190) Project Description: This project consists of the installation of four single-

post shade structures at Malibu Bluffs Park

(cid:190) Estimated Schedule:

(cid:131) Complete Design: Summer 2021
(cid:131) Begin Construction: Fall 2021

Vehicle Protection Devices

(cid:190) Project Description: Per Malibu Municipal Code Section 17.48.070 requires
vehicle impact protection devices to be installed for all parking spaces
located adjacent to any outdoor pedestrian seating area. There are two
locations within the City’s right-of-way and City-owned property that would
require a vehicle impact protection device.', metadata={'chunk_index': 6, 'source': 'data/civic/extracted_data/malibucity_agenda__01272021-1626.txt', 'start_index': 5180})]

out_data: The projects starting before 2022 are the Westward Beach Road Shoulder Repairs and the Clover Heights Storm Drain project. The Westward Beach Road Shoulder Repairs project has an estimated design completion in July 2022 and construction starting in Fall 2022. The Clover Heights Storm Drain project is estimated to complete design in Spring 2022 and begin construction in Summer 2022.

node_4.prompt:
content="You are an assistant for question-answering tasks. Use the following pieces of retrieved context to answer the question. If you don't know the answer, just say that you don't know. Use three sentences maximum and keep the answer concise.
Question: names of projects starting before 2022 
Context: skip for short 
Answer:"

in_data: ['The projects starting before 2022 are the Westward Beach Road Shoulder Repairs and the Clover Heights Storm Drain project. The Westward Beach Road Shoulder Repairs project has an estimated design completion in July 2022 and construction starting in Fall 2022. The Clover Heights Storm Drain project is estimated to complete design in Spring 2022 and begin construction in Summer 2022.']
out_data: The projects starting before 2022 are the Westward Beach Road Shoulder Repairs and the Clover Heights Storm Drain project.

node_5.prompt:
System: You are an expert at merging sub-answers into a final answer.                 Perform query merging, given a initial question,                 a list of its sub-queries and sub-answers, merge them into a final answer.                 These sub-answers are generated correspondingly from the sub-questions that                 have been well decomposed.                 Hence you need to find an intersection between the sub-answers to generate the final answer                 for the initial question.                 If there are acronyms or words you are not familiar with, do not try to rephrase them.                Your final answer should be a well-structured and coherent response to the initial question.

The Clover Heights Storm Drain project is estimated to complete design in Spring 2022 and begin construction in Summer 2022.']}
